name: CreateProjectInTicktick
description:
Create a new project in Ticktick with optional properties.

Use this tool to create a new project in Ticktick. You can specify the project's name and other optional properties such as color, sort order, view mode, and kind (TASK or NOTE).

parameters.name: project_name
parameters.description: Name of the project to be created. This is a required field.

parameters.name: project_color
parameters.description: Hex color code representing the project's color (e.g., '#F18181').

value_schema.description: Color of project - hex color code (e.g., '#F18181')

parameters.name: project_sort_order
parameters.description: The integer value representing the project's sort order.

value_schema.description: Sort order value of the project

parameters.name: project_view_mode
parameters.description: The display mode for the project: choose from 'list', 'kanban', or 'timeline'.

value_schema.description: View mode - how the project should be displayed (list, kanban, or timeline)

parameters.name: project_kind
parameters.description: Specifies the type of items the project will store. Choose 'TASK' for tasks or 'NOTE' for notes.

value_schema.description: Project kind - type of items to store (TASK or NOTE)

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the ticktick API.

parameters.name: color
parameters.description: Color of project - hex color code (e.g., '#F18181')

value_schema.description: Color of project - hex color code (e.g., '#F18181')

parameters.name: sortOrder
parameters.description: Sort order value of the project

value_schema.description: Sort order value of the project

parameters.name: viewMode
parameters.description: View mode - how the project should be displayed (list, kanban, or timeline)

value_schema.description: View mode - how the project should be displayed (list, kanban, or timeline)

parameters.name: kind
parameters.description: Project kind - type of items to store (TASK or NOTE)

value_schema.description: Project kind - type of items to store (TASK or NOTE)

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
